title: Sammy Ameobi
summary: Samuel Oluwaseyi Jesutoromo Ameobi (born 1 May 1992) is a professional footballer who plays as a winger for Championship club Middlesbrough. He is the younger brother of fellow players Shola and Tomi Ameobi. He began his career with Newcastle United, joining the club's youth academy in 2008. After progressing into the first team, he made his senior debut in May 2011.
